dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1765 IH: SNAP Benefits Fairness Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Payne (for himself, Mrs. Watson Coleman, Ms. Norton, Mrs. Cherfilus-McCormick, Mr. Gomez, Mr. McGovern, Mr. García of Illinois, Mr. Mullin, Ms. Plaskett, Mr. Smith of Washington, and Ms. Adams) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to repeal the limitation on the maximum deduction for shelter expenses allowable for determination of benefits under such Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the SNAP Benefits Fairness Act of 2023.
Section 5(e)(6) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2014(e)(6)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating subparagraphs (C) and (D) as subparagraphs (B) and (C), respectively.

section.text: This Act and the amendments made by this Act shall take effect on January 1 that 1st occurs after the date of the enactment of this Act.
